Name: TA 1302 Rate limit edit page UI tests

Tests.Name: Test 1: Create a rate limit from the list page

Steps.Name: Step: Create a rate limit with default values
Step: User can create a rate limit with text name
Step: User can create a rate limit with long name
Step: User can create a rate limit with special chars name
Step: User can create a rate limit with trimmed name
Step: User can check trimmedname
Step: User cannot create a rate limit with empty name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a rate limit with the same name

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name testname already exists in document [ratelimits]'

Steps.Name: Step: User can create rate limit with one 'Count by' key
Step: User cannot delete Count by keys when we have only one
Step: User can add more than one Count by keys
Step: Check that count by `header` cannot be empty
Step: Check that count by `cookie` cannot be empty
Step: Check that count by `argument` cannot be empty
Step: User cannot add same key twice to rate limit `count_a`
Step: User can create a rate limit`s timeframe with positive number
Step: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with '0' number
Step: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with text value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'text' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    'text'"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a rate limit `api_tester_i` with negative timeframe number
Step: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with decimal number

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.25 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    1.25"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with empty value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Step: User can check all action`s types
Step: User cannot create a ban with '0' value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
0 is less than the minimum of 1

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    0"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a ban with '1' value

Expected.Text: b'ttl can only be a multiple of 60'

Steps.Name: Step: User can create a ban with '1440' value
Step: User cannot create a ban with '1441' value

Expected.Text: b'ttl can only be a multiple of 60'

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a ban with empty value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a ban with negative value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
-1 is less than the minimum of 1

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    -1"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a ban with decimal value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.22 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    1.22"

Steps.Name: Step: User can create a rate limit with one tag in include field
Step: User can create a rate limit with one tag in exclude field
Step: User can add several tags to include field
Step: User can add several tags to exclude field
Step: User cannot add same tag to include field twice
Step: User cannot add same tag to exclude field twice
Step: User cannot add same tag to exclude and include fields
Step: User cannot add tag with length less then 3 chars to include field
Step: User cannot add tag with length less then 3 chars to exclude field
Step: User can create a rate limit `timeevzero` with number of events: `0`
Step: User can create a rate limit `time_ev_fifteen` with number of events: `15`
Step: User cannot create rate limit `time_ev_text` with number of events: `text`

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'text' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['threshold']:
    {'description': 'The threshold of requests allowed',
     'title': 'Threshold',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['threshold']:
    'text'"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create rate limit `time_ev_negative` with number of events: `-1`
Step: User cannot create rate limit `time_ev_dec` with number of events: `1.25`

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.25 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['threshold']:
    {'description': 'The threshold of requests allowed',
     'title': 'Threshold',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['threshold']:
    1.25"

Tests.Name: Test 16: linked Security policy we cannot Delete

Steps.Name: Step: User can create a rate limit 'security_policy_a'
Step: User can add security policy 'default' to new rate limit 'security_policy_a'
Step: User cannot delete the rate limit with attached security policy
Step: User can create a rate limit 'test_delete'
Step: User can delete the rate limit 'test_delete'
